mapper.select: select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", companyname "companyname", businessno "businessno", leader "leader", regicapital "regicapital", regicapitalbz "regicapitalbz", linkmanname "linkmanname", mobile "mobile", servicecustomerno "servicecustomerno", businessscope "businessscope", companyintro "companyintro", workaddress "workaddress", registeraddress "registeraddress", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.organ_rollin where serialno = #{serialno} for update

select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", companyname "companyname", businessno "businessno", leader "leader", regicapital "regicapital", regicapitalbz "regicapitalbz", linkmanname "linkmanname", mobile "mobile", servicecustomerno "servicecustomerno", businessscope "businessscope", companyintro "companyintro", workaddress "workaddress", registeraddress "registeraddress", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.organ_rollin where serialno = #{serialno}

select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", companyname "companyname", businessno "businessno", leader "leader", regicapital "regicapital", regicapitalbz "regicapitalbz", linkmanname "linkmanname", mobile "mobile", servicecustomerno "servicecustomerno", businessscope "businessscope", companyintro "companyintro", workaddress "workaddress", registeraddress "registeraddress", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.organ_rollin where serialno = #{serialno}
mapper.insert: insert into cas.organ_rollin( serialno,customerno,companyname,businessno,leader, regicapital,regicapitalbz,linkmanname,mobile,servicecustomerno, businessscope,companyintro,workaddress,registeraddress,insertdate, inserttime,updatedate,updatetime ) values( #{serialno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{companyname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{businessno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{leader, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regicapital, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{regicapitalbz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{linkmanname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{servicecustomerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessscope, jdbcType=CLOB},#{companyintro, jdbcType=CLOB},#{workaddress, jdbcType=CLOB},#{registeraddress, jdbcType=CLOB},#{insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into cas.organ_rollin( serialno,customerno,companyname,businessno,leader, regicapital,regicapitalbz,linkmanname,mobile,servicecustomerno, businessscope,companyintro,workaddress,registeraddress,insertdate, inserttime,updatedate,updatetime ) values
( #{item.serialno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.companyname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.businessno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.leader, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.regicapital, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.regicapitalbz, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.linkmanname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.servicecustomerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.businessscope, jdbcType=CLOB},#{item.companyintro, jdbcType=CLOB},#{item.workaddress, jdbcType=CLOB},#{item.registeraddress, jdbcType=CLOB},#{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
